EmailTemplate.name: SC-EN.SC-EM-3-EN
EmailTemplate.subject: How ergonomic is your setup? Find out!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}},
Sitting all day, working with computers might be considered a low risk work environment, however it comes with very real health risks that can lead to long term health problems like musculoskeletal disorders. This makes ergonomics a high priority. Do you know how ergonomic your office setup is?
Complete the ergonomic assessment quiz <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/J8KWZWN]]> to find out.
Best, Olivier Dubeau Government Account Manager, Public Sector If you're having difficulty accessing the link in this email, please copy and paste the following link into your web browser: https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/J8KWZWN 900 Belfast Road, Ottawa, ON K1G 0Z6 E-mail: OlivierDubeau@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:OlivierDubeau@grandandtoy.com]]> | Cell: 613-355-1698 Office Supplies | Interiors & Furniture | Print & Documents | Facility Resources | Technology grandandtoy.com/gov <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/gov?cmp=ABM-FedGov-RCMP&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: The content of this e-mail (and attachments, if any) is privileged and confidential, and intended solely for its designated recipient(s). Any dissemination, distribution or copying of this e-mail, other than by its intended recipient(s), is strictly prohibited. If you have received this e-mail by error, please delete it and notify us immediately by reply e-mail.
